visualization_prompt: Generate a column chart showing monthly sales performance with synthetic data using Highcharts gradient fills and trend annotations
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains 12 monthly observations of synthetic revenue data (ratio scale) with intentionally engineered statistical properties: μ=158.3k, σ=31.2k, demonstrating a 22.4% YTD growth trend with Q4 seasonality. Synthetic values were generated using linear regression (β=9.8k/month) plus normally distributed noise (ε ~ N(0, 8k)). The column chart maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating redundant gridlines and using monochromatic encoding, while Cairo's perceptual principles are applied through proportional width encoding and value-contrasting gradient fills. Annotated statistical anchors in the subtitle provide immediate distribution context, and the temporal progression follows ISO-8601 month sequence for accurate pattern recognition.
